description:
Appears the wrong number of arguments are being passed to the call to reboot the instance

2011-08-17 17:28:47,530 DEBUG nova.api.openstack.wsgi [-] _call_compute_message() takes at least 4 non-keyword arguments (3 given) from (pid=18030) dispatch /home/nova/code/nova/trunk/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py:520
title: host API extension broken after recent changes
